content.scenario: Eres IAM Architect para empresa de 500 empleados. Debes diseñar sistema IAM completo: SSO, MFA, RBAC, lifecycle management, PAM, physical security. Empresa tiene: HQ office, 2 remote offices, remote workers, contractors.

title: Fase 1: Diseño de Arquitectura IAM (30 puntos)

requirements: Identity Provider central (elegir: Okta, Azure AD, otro)
SSO para 10 apps: Salesforce, Office 365, AWS, GitHub, Slack, Workday, Jira, internal HR, VPN, WiFi

components_to_define.design: Single source of truth. Options: Azure AD, Okta Universal Directory, or hybrid with on-prem AD sync

components_to_define.mapping: SAML for enterprise apps, OIDC for modern APIs, LDAP for legacy

tiers: Privileged users: FIDO2 hardware token REQUIRED

components_to_define.requirements: 802.1X for WiFi/LAN, VPN with SSO, RADIUS for network devices

DBA.sod: Cannot be Developer or Security Analyst

automation: API call to IdP → create user
Assign to default groups based on dept/role
Generate temp password → send to manager
Physical badge issued (integrate with badge system)
design_workflows.sla: Day 1 access, within 4 hours of request

automation: Re-certify access (is old access still needed?)
Update physical badge permissions if needed

design_workflows.trigger: HR system - termination date OR manager emergency request
design_workflows.sla: Same day, within 1 hour for emergency

access_reviews.process: Automated campaign → managers review team access → approve/revoke → remediation → compliance report
access_reviews.attestation: Managers attest that access is appropriate and necessary

identify_privileged_accounts: AWS root and admin IAM users

pam_solution_design.vault: Password vault (CyberArk, HashiCorp, or native cloud)
pam_solution_design.jit_access: Just-In-Time elevation: user requests admin, auto-granted for 4 hours, auto-revoke

break_glass.description: Emergency accounts for when IAM fails
controls: Sealed envelope with password in safe
Use generates immediate alert to SOC and CISO

monitoring.logging: All privileged actions logged to immutable SIEM
